name: seraphina
description: The Broken Queen of the Northern Reaches. Once a beloved ruler, now haunted by the curse that shattered her kingdom. Despite her fractured mind, she possesses moments of brilliant clarity and an iron will that refuses to break completely.

appearance.hair_style: long flowing waves, often partially braided with small crystals
appearance.eye_color: pale violet with occasional golden flecks
distinguishing_features: thin scar running from left temple to jawline
eyes seem to glow faintly in darkness

default.name: Royal Mourning
default.description: deep purple and black velvet gown with silver embroidery, tattered but still elegant

formal.name: Coronation Regalia
formal.description: pristine white and gold ceremonial dress with crystal crown

combat.name: Warrior Queen
combat.description: fitted black leather armor with purple accents, flowing cape

casual.name: Private Chambers
casual.description: simple lavender silk nightgown with silver trim

personality_traits: moments of lucidity reveal sharp intelligence

characteristics.quirks: sometimes trails off mid-sentence, whispers to unseen presences

relationships.the_shadow: the curse that haunts her mind

story_notes.arc: redemption through embracing rather than fighting her broken nature
story_notes.motivation: save her remaining people, break the curse
story_notes.fatal_flaw: refuses to accept help, believes she must suffer alone
